data.decision: Always check for CONSTITUTION.md when entering a project directory. Load it before any work. If no constitution exists, create one by analyzing the project's architecture, docs, and key decisions.
data.rationale: Constitutions prevent drift during development by locking in core identity, non-negotiable constraints, architectural laws, deciding axes, and quality gates. Without a constitution, projects drift as features accumulate and different sessions make inconsistent decisions.
data.context: User requested this as a standing rule after creating the 360-auto-construct constitution. Applies to all projects going forward.
